definitions: A container filled with explosive or incendiary material, designed to explode on impact or when detonated by a timing, proximity, or remote-control device.
An explosive device fitted into a specified object.
Nuclear weapons considered collectively as agents of mass destruction.
A lump of lava thrown out by an erupting volcano.
A pear-shaped weight used to anchor a fishing line to the bottom.
A film, play, or other event that fails badly.
An outstandingly good person or thing.
A long forward pass or hit in a ball game.
